title: Hemang Jani on why FIIs are selling HDFC Bank and not Bajaj Finance - Economic Times
content: Hemang Jani on why FIIs are selling HDFC Bank and not Bajaj Finance  Economic Times
description: “If you ask me whether I would buy Bajaj Finance or HDFC Bank at current price, the clear answer is HDFC Bank and I am not reading too much into why Bajaj Finance is not falling because it is all about institutional ownership and what kind of exposure prune down they want to do. We should be looking out for investment opportunities in areas where there is a deeper cut.”
